issue.title: Add JIRA components
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will make it easier to look at JIRAs in component-level views. In the style of Parquet, we could do something like this to start:

- Format
- Java
- C++
- Python
